name: Cyclops Run
description:
Description

Cyclops Run is a classic shooter and platform game where you are a Cyclops who is trying to save the Cyclops race from the evil Brocco, a giant evil supersized broccoli that has made robots and turrets to destroy and lock up your fellow Cyclops friends! Run through various levels and travel through Ghost Houses which sends you to a pitch black level where you can only see yourself and the enemies! Will you survive all of Brocco's traps, or will you end up like the others, locked into extinction?

Plotline

You play as a Cyclops named Cito, and you are hunting down the evil Brocco who has enslaved the Cyclops Race. Embark on a journey of revenge as you seek to navigate the strange world in which the Cyclops Race lives, and to free your race to prevent extinction of the Cyclops Species. 

This game takes place in the same universe as the Don't Die franchise. 

Game Engine: Gamemaker 8.1 (Lite)

Original Release: 2012

Developed by: Cyclops Studios (Defunct)

Credits:

Game Story by: Canyon Forkash

Sprites and Animations: Canyon Forkash/Andrew Menningen

Programming: Andrew Menningen

Level Designs: Canyon Forkash

Music: MCD, Interplay (Descent II Soundtracks)
